significance: A pelagic fish vital for coastal livelihoods; highly nutritious and central to local cuisines.
A keystone pelagic resource; its abundance indicates monsoon upwelling and healthy ecosystems.
An iconic fish of the Ganges delta; central to Bengali heritage and monsoon fishery traditions.

title: Cast Net (Veeshal Vala)
description: Circular net with lead weights thrown by hand in shallow waters; used for sardines and anchovies.

title: Shore Seine (Thallu Vala)
description: Long nets dragged from the shore; cooperative fishing linked to post-monsoon fish migrations.

title: Monsoon Fishing Pause
description: Fishing halts during the monsoon to allow breeding; communities celebrate sea-blessing festivals like Kadalamma Pooja before reopening.
